column2: Reviewed and confirmed that the pathologist states the primary to be "in situ" or "malignant" although the behavior code of the histology is designated as "benign" or "uncertain" in ICD-O-2 or ICD-O-3
Reviewed: The behavior code is "in situ", but the case is not microscopically confirmed
Reviewed: Conditions 1 and 2 above both apply
